author: abcoathup
content:
This Discord is for Ethereum R&D discussion.  It isn't for application layer recruitment.  
As per the Welcome message, try CryptoDevs discord: https://discord.gg/5W5tVb3

author: treyzania
content: From the cryptodevs server, these posts are just bots, sometimes legit accounts that have been compromised, they wait for people to DM them for freelance work and then run off with the money, we usually just ban posts like these on sight now

author: treyzania
content: We've seen an uptick in the last month or so
